title: IARI Recruitment 2025 - Apply for Junior Research Fellow Post
description: The Indian Agricultural Research Institute ( IARI) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Junior Research Fellow Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech, M.E/ M.Tech, and M.Sc can grab this chance and apply for the IARI Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, and salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply on or befor...
